content: **knitted neck-warmer and hat in drops lima and drops kid-silk the piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the cardinal song hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-159 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **neck-warmer ** **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/ xl shoulder-width approx 27-30-33 cm length without neck approx 26-28-30 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200-200 g colour 3609 red and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 14 red **needles** drops circular needles size 4 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needles size 3 5 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/242-22-a-cardinal-song-hat
